pages.title: Meteor Kitchen & IoT (Internet of Things) example
pages.text:
Showing geiger sensor from RevSpace in real-time. Server is connected to mqtt://test.mosquitto.org MQTT broker and subscribed to "revspace/sensors/geiger" topic. Received messages are written into "Sensors" collection and shown to users.
Source code (input file for generator) is here.
